scripts.node: concurrently "npm exec -w core -- hardhat node" "wait-port localhost:8545 && npm exec -w core -- hardhat run scripts/deploy-local.ts --network localhost"
scripts.start: npm run compile && concurrently "npm run node" "HOST=localhost npm run start -w app"
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network matic -w core
scripts.console:matic: npm run hardhat console --network matic -w core
